Package de.dedede.model.persistence.daos

Class UserDao

java.lang.Object
de.dedede.model.persistence.daos.UserDao
public final class UserDao extends Object
This DAO (data access object) manages data and privileges for users, who are identified by their email addresses. In particular, this DAO implements the CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete). See the UserDto class for the used DTO.

  • Method Details

    • createUser

      public static void createUser​(UserDto userDto) throws EntityInstanceNotUniqueException
      Enters new user data into the persistent data store. The enclosed email address must not be associated with an existing user in the data store. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      userDto - A DTO container with the new user data.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceNotUniqueException - Is thrown when the enclosed ID is already associated with an existing data entry.

    • readUserByEmail

      public static UserDto readUserByEmail​(UserDto userDto) throws EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException
      Fetches user data associated with a given email. The email address must be associated with a user in the data store. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      email - A DTO container with the email address that identifies the user to be fetched.
      Returns:
      A DTO container with the fetched user.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown when the enclosed email address isn't associated with an existing data entry.

    • updateUser

      public static void updateUser​(UserDto userDto) throws EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException
      Overwrites user data associated with a given email. The email address must be associated with a user in the data store. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      userDto - A DTO container with the overwriting user data.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown when the enclosed email address isn't associated with an existing data entry.

    • deleteUser

      public static UserDto deleteUser​(UserDto userDto) throws EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException
      Deletes user data associated with a given email address. The email address must be associated with a user in the data store. Otherwise, an exception is thrown.
      Parameters:
      email - A DTO container with an email address identifying the user to be deleted.
      Returns:
      A DTO container with data from the deleted user.
      Throws:
      EntityInstanceDoesNotExistException - Is thrown when the enclosed email address isn't associated with an existing data entry.
